quotes: He has been a senior fellow with the Japan Center for International Exchange (JCIE) since 2007
and was a research fellow at the Harvard School of Public Health from November 2007 to June 2009
In 2016, he was appointed to the UN High Level Commission on Health Employment and Economic Growth
in 2018, to the UHC Financing Advisory Committee for the G20 2019
he was appointed WHO Goodwill Ambassador for Universal Health Coverage (UHC) in July 2019
Since September 2007, he has been serving as the chair of the Executive Committee of JCIE’s Global Health and Human Security Program
